name: Intro to Digital and New Media Art
description: An introductory course to digital and new media art and its history and evolution.

name: Computer Graphics
description: A course that covers fundamentals of computer graphics and its applications in art.
prerequisites: Intro to Digital and New Media Art

name: 3D Modeling
description: A course that covers fundamentals of 3D modeling and its applications in art.

name: Interactive Art and Media Design
description: A course that covers interactive art and media design and its applications in art.

name: Advanced Digital and New Media Art
description: An advanced course to digital and new media art and its history and evolution.
prerequisites: Intro to Digital and New Media Art
